pageContent: Purpose: To review the current status of high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) therapy in the prostate, in particular the treatment of prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
To what extent does the prostate-specific antigen nadir predict subsequent treatment failure after transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound therapy for presumed localized adenocarcinoma of the prostate?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16925749/
